body_html:
Maybe the way I calculate the result is inappropriate. The dynamic range of the FFT is quiet big. So adding all the tiny and large values maybe results into this error on the GPU?
I just ported a python code to Tensorflow and the numerical results are completely wrong. I'm still searching for the error and I was taking the numerical precision into account, but maybe it's also another problem. Thanks1
